dialogue.text: What am I to do?
Oh dear, oh dear, oh dear, I'm in a terrible terrible mess! It's the Duke's birthday today, and I should be making him a lovely big birthday cake.
I've forgotten to buy the ingredients. I'll never get them in time now. He'll sack me! What will I do? I have four children and a goat to look after. Would you help me? Please?
Oh thank you, thank you. I need milk, an egg and flour. I'd be very grateful if you can get them for me.
That's an odd coincidence... Were you planning on making a cake too?
Well thank you! Hand them over, please.
You've brought me everything I need! I am saved! Thank you!
I'm afraid not, only the big cheeses get to dine with the Duke.
Maybe, but I won't be holding my breath.
There is a Mill fairly close, go North and then West. Mill Lane Mill is just off the road to Draynor. I usually get my flour from there.
Talk to Millie, she'll help, she's a lovely girl and a fine Miller. Make sure you take a pot with you for the flour though, you've got one on you already.
Talk to Millie, she'll help, she's a lovely girl and a fine Miller. Make sure you take a pot with you for the flour though, there should be one on the table in here.
There is a cattle field on the other side of the river, just across the road from the Groats' Farm.
Talk to Gillie Groats, she looks after the Dairy cows - she'll tell you everything you need to know about milking cows!
You'll need an empty bucket for the milk itself. I do see you've got a bucket with you already luckily!
You'll need an empty bucket for the milk itself. The general store just north of the castle will sell you one for a couple of coins.
I normally get my eggs from the Groats' farm, on the other side of the river.
But any chicken should lay eggs.
Fine. I always knew you Adventurer types were callous beasts. Go on your merry way!
*sniff* Don't talk to me about cakes...
No, I'm not. The world is caving in around me - I am overcome by dark feelings of impending doom.
No, that's the worst thing I could do. I'd get in terrible trouble.
That would be nice, but the Duke doesn't allow holidays for core staff.
My wife gets sea sick, and I have an irrational fear of eyepatches. I don't see it working myself.
I know I'm doomed.
Err thank you. It's a pretty ordinary cooks hat really.
Its all standard cook's issue uniform...
I am a real cook! I haven't got time to be chatting about Culinary Fashion. I am in desperate need of help!
How are you getting on with finding the ingredients?
Please get the ingredients quickly. I'm running out of time! The Duke will throw me into the streets!
Thanks for the ingredients you have got so far. Please get the rest quickly - I'm running out of time! The Duke will throw me into the streets!
How is the adventuring going, my friend?
I don't have anything for you to do right now, sorry.
Glad to hear it.
Ah well, at least you keep coming back to life!
Go ahead - it's a very good range. It's easier to use than most other ranges.
Its called the Cook-o-matic 100. It uses a combination of state of the art temperature regulation and magic.
Well, that's what the salesman told us anyway...
Hey, who said you could use that?
I am listening.
I may have some lying around the kitchen, I would gladly give you some milk for the Easter Bunny.
But first you must answer a riddle. If you get it right, I will give you some Hosidius milk.
Are you ready to answer my riddle?
I leave my home only once a year, but do not give any Christmas cheer. Who am I?
I am sorry but that is not quite right.
Talk to me when you're ready to try again.
Congratulations, that's the right answer.
Here is the Hosidius milk I promised.
Filling me with eggs is bad... but I'll make a case for it.
When dark and bitter, drink me warm in the winter.
I am round, yet not a perfect sphere. I can be cracked and not have anything inside. What am I?
You should probably go and give the milk to the Easter Bunny, hop to it. Don't want to keep the Easter Bunny waiting.
Of course I do, try not to spill it this time.
Well done.
I've always wondered how many cannons the castle has. Could you find out for me?
Please tell me how many cannons there are.
Hmm, I don't think that's right.
Cheers!
Oh, what a cute bunny! I didn't realize it was Easter already!
Hmm... Well, I do have a large collection of eggs, but most of them are regular old chicken eggs for making cakes.
Though come to think of it, I might have something...
I have a... 'special' collection of eggs that I keep in the... well... back of my cupboards for very... 'special' occasions.
I don't know if this occasion is special enough, though.
Well, that's me convinced! Let me dig them out for you!
Don't mention it!
Seriously, don't mention it.
There's a sheep pen not too far north of here. You could get some fresh wool if you wanted.
Yes, go to the sheep pen and out of my kitchen...
Oh, you're still here.
Didn't you say you were off to the sheep pen north of here?
Actually, while you're still here, there's something else you can do.
It's the Duke's birthday soon, and I'm running low on ingredients.
Ahem... forget I said anything.
I... well yes, but how else am I supposed to train cooking?
And have the entire castle smelling like Port Sarim? No thank you!
Well, he wanted some funny looking eggs, and they were the funniest I had.
Just be thankful he didn't ask for some fancy milk instead!
I think he said he was going to the sheep pen north of here.
How should I know? You should check in Draynor, maybe you'll find him there.
You were seriously great when you defeated the Culinaromancer! I can't believe I nearly caused all of those people to be killed! So how is the adventuring going now?
Patty is likely to know more than me, try chatting to her!
Ooh dear, yes I do! It's the Duke of Lumbridge's birthday today, and I need to bake him a cake!
I need you to bring me some eggs, some flour, some milk and a chocolate bar...
Nah, not really, I'm just messing with you! Thanks for all your help, I know I can count on you again in the future!
